title: The Zweitstimme Forecast for the German Federal Election 2025
authors: Cornelius Erfort, Lukas F. Stoetzer, Thomas Gschwend, Elias Koch, Simon Munzert, and Hannah Rajski
abstract: We provide a forecast for the German Federal Election of 2025, using our forecasting models for national-level party vote shares and district-level outcomes, including coalition majorities and vacant districts under the recent electoral reforms.
bibtex: @article{Erfort_Stoetzer_2025, title={The Zweitstimme Forecast for the German Federal Election 2025}, journal={PS: Political Science & Politics}, author={Erfort, Cornelius and Stoetzer, Lukas F. and Gschwend, Thomas and Koch, Elias and Munzert, Simon and Rajski, Hannah}, year={2025}}
